Job Title: Graphic Designer and Copywriter Extraordinaire

Location: Texas, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Join Our Growing Team at MPower Marketing Group!
Are you a talented individual seeking a long-term opportunity with a dynamic marketing agency? MPower Marketing Group is on the lookout for the perfect team member to join our expanding team. We pride ourselves on fostering a collaborative environment where creativity thrives and innovation is encouraged.
The ideal candidate will have strong creative skills and a portfolio of work which demonstrates their passion for illustrative design and typography. This candidate will have experiences in working with numerous different design platforms such as digital and print forms.  ResponsibilitiesCollaborate with the team to ensure consistency of designs across various media outletsCreate compelling and effective logos, designs, print and digital mediaMaintain awareness of current industry and technology standards, social media, competitive landscape and market trendsCraft compelling copy that resonates with our target audience across various platforms and channels.Demonstrate impeccable time management skills to ensure deadlines are met and projects are delivered on timeServe as a client-facing representative, building strong relationships and delivering exceptional customer serviceLeverage your interpersonal skills to collaborate with team members and clients, fostering a positive and supportive work environmentBring your creative flair to the table, contributing fresh ideas and innovative solutions to drive results.
QualificationsBachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field2-4 years of experience in graphic designProficient in Adobe Creative SuiteStrong communication, time management, conceptual thinking, critical thinking, typography skills and design skillsPortfolio of work - both art and creative writingAbility to work remotelyCommunicate effectively
Why Join Us?Opportunity for long-term growth and development within a thriving marketing agency.Continuous training and development opportunitiesCollaborative and supportive team environment where your ideas are valued.Flexibility to work from home while maintaining a healthy work-life balance.Exciting projects and clients across various industries to showcase your talents.
If you are a creative individual with a passion for marketing and possess the skills we're looking for, we want to hear from you! Join us at MPower Marketing Group and be a part of our journey towards success.

Experience Level (if available): None
